# [Interview #571: TOM Signing Report - Zaela Sedai, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=571#7)

#### Question

Was Demandred or his proxy in
*Towers of Midnight*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, he was not; he will be in
*A Memory of Light*
.
